remarks: The product of two nonzero elements of a division ring is nonzero. (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2011.)
statement:
drngmcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
drngmcl.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
drngmcl.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
drngmcl $p |- ( ( R e. DivRing /\ X e. ( B \ { .0. } ) /\ Y e. ( B \ { .0. } ) ) -> ( X .x. Y ) e. ( B \ { .0. } ) ) $.
